name: Idol Assist
description: Increase stats of allies on map by 20%.

name: Voracious Spirit
description: Increase EXP & Mana gain for all allies on map by 30%.

name: Acceleration Mascot
description: Increase Movement of Allies on map by 2.

name: Usagi Guard
description: Decrease non-attack damage taken by all allies on map by 25%.

name: Total Worship Aura
description: Decrease elemental damage taken by all allies on map by 5%.

name: Man-Eating Bunny
description: When defeating an enemy, obtain Extracts based on its stats.

name: Overlord's Dignity
description: Increase stats by 10% per unit defeated.

name: Strong Personality
description: Increase Special damage dealt by 25%.

name: Gaze of Supremacy
description: Reduce damage taken from units below 50% HP by 50%.

name: Legendary Strength
description: Without allies, increase attack power by 50%, but decrease defense power by 50%.

name: Furious Rage
description: Increase ATK by 5% every time a normal attack is received. (Max 100%).

name: Overlord's Strike
description: Increase critical rate by 30% and critical damage by 100% when using Specials.

name: Sadistic
description: Increase damage dealt to targets with full HP by 50%.

name: Bomber Gal
description: Increase explosive damage by 100% for thrown units.

name: Vassal Defense
description: An ally Prinny on the map will cover when this unit is attacked.

name: Busty Killer
description: When attacking, increase attack power by 50% against bodacious female units.

name: Dominant Smile
description: Increase stats of all ally Prinnies on map by 15%.

name: Beauty Queen
description: Switches movement type to Warp. Increase Move by 2 and Jump Power by 20.

name: Queen Glitter
description: Increase Attack power of male allies on the map by 20%.

name: Queen Orders
description: Increase Magic Range of units in the same squad by 1. (Max 3).

name: Princess Hope
description: Increase critical rate by 5% for units in the same squad. (Max 30%).

name: Frigid Rose
description: Increase water damage dealt by 30%, and decrease water damage taken by 30%.

name: Four-Leaf Emblem
description: Increase damage dealt by 50% when using spells.

name: Hidden Cruelty
description: Increase stats by 100% when remaining HP is 10% or less.

name: Indomitable Fist
description: After attacking with a fist or a unique skill, attack again.

name: Bend or Break
description: Parry rate is boosted by 15% when fists are equipped.

name: Daily Training
description: Increase Class & Skill EXP received by 50%.

name: Hard Boiled Man
description: Increase fire damage dealt by 30%, and decrease fire damage taken by 30%.

name: One-Inch Punch
description: When attacking adjacent units, increase attack power by 50%.

name: Fighting Spirit
description: Increase fire damage dealt by 10% every time a normal attack is received. (Max 100%).

name: Dream Girl
description: When attacked with a Special, decrease damage taken by 30%.

name: Prinny Hat
description: Will be treated like a Prinny. (Won't explode when thrown).

name: Powered by Sweets
description: Increase stats by 30% when using a sweets-type item. (Lasts 3 turns)

name: All Meat!
description: Increase critical damage by 75% when an axe is equipped.

name: Tri-Angel (Big Sis)
description: Increase Steal success rate by 50%. Check out Fuka & Desco!

name: First Impression
description: When attacking during the first turn, increase damage dealt by 50%.

name: Queen's Temper
description: Increase attack power by 50% when attacking male units.

name: Search Coin
description: If on map when stage is cleared, gain HL equal to level.

name: Heart Shot
description: 10% chance of Charming the target when attacking with a gun.

name: HL Power
description: Increase stats by 2% per digit of HL possessed.

name: Reverse Harem
description: Increase stats by 15% per adjacent male ally.

name: Life and Death
description: When attacking a Charmed or Puppeted unit, deal a Deathblow to the Target.

name: Evil Academy Honors
description: Increase damage dealt by 5% per enemy unit on the map.

name: Star Gazer
description: Increase star damage dealt by 20%, and reduce star damage taken by 20%.

name: Weakness Analyzer
description: Increase critical rate by 30% when glasses are equipped.

name: D.I. Overclock
description: Increase attack power by 50% while Jumbified, but reduce number of turns Jumbified by 2.

name: Item Overupgrade
description: Add 100 LP during Item Reincarnation if leading the Item Reincarnation Squad.

name: Elemental Removal
description: When hit with an elemental attack, remove elemental properties from the attack.

name: Obvious Tendency
description: Increase stats by 5% per female unit on map.

name: Entertainment Life
description: When own HP is under 25%, decrease damage taken from elemental attack by 50%.

name: Electric Soul
description: Increase wind damage dealt by 30%, and reduce wind damage taken by 30%.

name: Explosive Skit
description: Units explode when thrown for the first time. (Once per battle. Nullified if resistant to Deathblow)

name: Star Aura
description: Decrease damage taken by 25% when attacked by humanoid unit.

name: Dark Hero
description: Increase stats by 100% when no other units enter or are able to enter battle.

name: Final Boss Setting
description: Increase attack power by 10% per ally within 2 panels.

name: Final Boss Rage
description: Increase critical rate by 30% while Jumbified.

name: No Escape
description: Reduce movement by 5 for enemies within 3 panels.

name: Tri Angel (Li'l Sis)
description: Switches movement type to Flying. Increase Movement by 1 and Jump by 10.

name: Fearsome Onesome
description: Decrease attack power and weapon resistances of enemies within 3 panels by 20%.

name: Ultimate Final Boss
description: Increase attack and defense power by 100% when no other units enter or are able to enter battle.

name: Absorption
description: When defeating enemy, increase own stats by 10% of defeated target's stats.

name: Prinny Instructor
description: Increase EXP, Mana & Class Proficiency gained by Prinnies in assigned squad by 20%.

name: Sardine Supremacy
description: When using a sardine, recover 900% HP and increase ATK by 20%. (Lasts 3 turns).

name: Blood Oath
description: Nullify non-sardine Heal effects. Increase max HP and SP by 100%.

name: Lord of the Prinnies
description: Increase research Prinnies' stats by 50% of own stats if leading the Research Support Squad

name: Sliver of Tyranny
description: When using Specials, increase attack power by 100% and SP cost by 200%.

name: Love Field
description: Decrease damage taken by all allies on map by 20%.

name: Iron Love Fist
description: Use RES to calculate attack power when equipped with fists.

name: Love Protection
description: Nullify status ailments.

name: Have You Loved?
description: Increase Magic Range of Heal Spells by 9.

name: Aura of Love
description: Decrease damage taken from monster units by 25%.

name: Missionary of Love
description: Increase stats by 10% per ally healed. (Max 100%).

name: Tyrant's Servant
description: Increase stats by 50% when Valvatorez is deployed as an ally.

name: Moon Promise
description: Increase stats by 20% when no units are Jumbified.

name: Intimidating Gaze
description: Reduce defense of enemies 1 panel in front by 50%.

name: Symbol of Loyalty
description: Cover when Valvatorez is attacked.

name: Moonlight Fang
description: Increase attack power by 35% when performing a wind attack.

name: Lone Wolf's Revenge
description: When Valvatorez dies, increase ATK power and damage dealt by 50%, but increase damage taken by 100%.

name: War Demon
description: Increase stats by 5% per attack made. (Max 100%)

name: Revengeance
description: Increase critical rate by 5% for every attack taken. (Max 50%).

name: Close Combatant
description: Decrease damage taken from adjacent units by 20%.

name: Flowerful Memories
description: Reduce wind damage taken by 50%.

name: Therapeutic Violence
description: Recover 1% of HP and SP when attacking. If critical, recover an extra 4%.

name: Powerful Bonds
description: During team attacks, increase critical damage by 25% per ally joining the team attack.

name: Angel Glitter
description: Increase stats of adjacent male allies by 50%.

name: Unconditional Love
description: Increase max HP by 30%, but gain 0 HL.

name: Tri-Angel (Angel)
description: Increase Item Rarity by 20 when steal is successful.

name: Holy Barrier
description: Decrease damage taken by 50% when hit with a magic attack.

name: Market Price
description: Gain HL equal to the item's sale price when steal is successful.

name: Last Rites
description: Upon death, fully restore HP & SP of all allies on map at the end of the turn. Increase their DEF power by 30%. (Lasts 3 turns).

name: Heroine's Temper
description: Increase damage dealt by male allies on the map by 30%.

name: Mermaid Chord
description: Increase water element damage dealt by 10% per adjacent ally unit.

name: Augmented Chord
description: Increase Spell Area by 1 per adjacent ally unit.

name: Magical Chord
description: Decrease SP cost of Specials by 10% per adjacent ally unit.

name: Extended Chord
description: Increase Magic Range by 1 per adjacent ally unit.

name: Power of (Fake) Love
description: Increase stats by 10% per adjacent unit of the opposite gender.

name: Super Reincarnator
description: Increase damage dealt by 2% per Reincarnation. (Max 100%)

name: Power Knuckle
description: Increase damage dealt by 30% when using fists.

name: Tenacity
description: Increase damage by 50% when counter-attacking.

name: Zombie Revival
description: Revive inside the Base Panel after being defeated. (Max 1 time per battle).

name: Defy the Strong
description: Decrease damage from higher level enemy units by 10%.

name: Infinite Reincarnation
description: Increase stats by 1% per Reincarnation. (Max 50%).

name: Li'l Sis Aura
description: Decrease elemental attack damage taken by 50%.

name: Get Along
description: Increase adjacent ally Team Attack rate by 50%.

name: We Love Prinnies!
description: Increases stats by 5% per Prinny on map. (Max 100%).

name: Angelic Gift
description: Restores 30% of DEF & RES for adjacent allies at the end of the turn. (Lasts 3 turns).

name: Hang Tough
description: Stats cannot fall below 90%.

name: Demonic Angel
description: Increase attack power by 50% when attacking demons.

name: Demonic Alteration
description: Increase adjacent ally damage dealt by 30% and adjacent enemy damage taken by 30%.

name: Psychotherapy
description: Increase adjacent ally RES by 30%.

name: Podiatric Upgrade
description: Increase movement of adjacent allies by 3 at the start of the turn. (Lasts 3 turns).

name: Star Shield
description: Increase Star Resistance by 50%, but reduce Max SP by 75%.

name: Li'l Sis Safeguard
description: Decrease damage taken by 20% when hit with a physical attack.

name: Sibling Love
description: Increase damage dealt by 25% if Zed is adjacent.

name: Overlord's Dignity
description: Increase stats by 10% per unit defeated.

name: Dead Sexy
description: Increase damage dealt by 30% when attacking male units.

name: Hyperfocus
description: Increase attack power by 5% for the leader of the affiliated squad.

name: Hasty Rush
description: Unit's very first attack of the stage will perform twice.

name: Knuckle Slamwich
description: 10% chance of inflicting stun when attacking normally.

name: Listen to my Song!
description: Increase attack power of male ally units by 5% per attack. (Max 100%)

name: Love Thy Heart
description: If enemy level is higher, damage dealt increases by 50%.

name: Super! Law by Range
description: Increase Magic Range by 5, and SP Cost by 100%.

name: Bestie Link
description: Increase attack power by 30% when another Bestie Link ally joins a team attack.

name: Innocent Educator
description: When set as the leader of Innocent Farm Squad, increase Innocent Growth Rate by 10%.

name: Finish Line Lover
description: When progressing through an Item World level while entering battle, increase item level rank increase by 1. (Doesn't stack).

name: Delinquent Demon
description: Increase attack power by 5% per combo when attacking.

name: Anti-Bully Aura
description: Decrease damage taken by you or adjacent allies by 10% per adjacent ally. (Max 40%)

name: I Love Curry
description: After using Curry, increase ATK by 50%. (Lasts 3 turns).

name: Star Body
description: Increase Star element resistance by 20%.

name: Death Resistance
description: Nullifies Deathblow.

name: Bunny Ear Radar
description: When attacked from the side or from behind, increase evasion rate by 50%.

name: Status Guard
description: Ally units' stats cannot fall below 75%.
